00041 extern "C" void _OGGSOUND_EXPORT dllStartPlugin( void )
00042 {
00043         // Create new plugin
00044         mOgreOggSoundPlugin = OGRE_NEW_T(OgreOggSoundPlugin, Ogre::MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL)();
00045 
00046         // Register
00047         Root::getSingleton().installPlugin(mOgreOggSoundPlugin);
00048 
00049 }
00050 extern "C" void _OGGSOUND_EXPORT dllStopPlugin( void )
00051 {
00052         Root::getSingleton().uninstallPlugin(mOgreOggSoundPlugin);
00053 
00054         OGRE_DELETE_T(mOgreOggSoundPlugin, OgreOggSoundPlugin, Ogre::MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL);
00055         mOgreOggSoundPlugin = 0;
00056 }
